title: [求救] 岩岩買左SONY HD-SL2外置HDD，但用落好似有D click聲.....

replies.msg:
呢隻


接駁左USB 3.0 port
用落有時(唔係regular) 有輕微click聲
不規則


岩岩用CrystalDiskMark check︰聽唔到聲

TEST 1
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
CrystalDiskMark 5.2.1 Shizuku Edition x64 (C) 2007-2017 hiyohiyo
Crystal Dew World : http://crystalmark.info/
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
* MB/s = 1,000,000 bytes/s [SATA/600 = 600,000,000 bytes/s]
* KB = 1000 bytes, KiB = 1024 bytes

Sequential Read (Q= 32,T= 1) : 127.507 MB/s
Sequential Write (Q= 32,T= 1) : 128.380 MB/s
Random Read 4KiB (Q= 32,T= 1) : 0.602 MB/s [ 147.0 IOPS]
Random Write 4KiB (Q= 32,T= 1) : 1.488 MB/s [ 363.3 IOPS]
Sequential Read (T= 1) : 126.880 MB/s
Sequential Write (T= 1) : 132.951 MB/s
Random Read 4KiB (Q= 1,T= 1) : 0.560 MB/s [ 136.7 IOPS]
Random Write 4KiB (Q= 1,T= 1) : 1.479 MB/s [ 361.1 IOPS]

Test : 1024 MiB [G: 0.0% (0.2/1863.0 GiB)] (x5) [Interval=5 sec]
Date : 2017/05/28 11:01:29
OS : Windows 8.1 [6.3 Build 9600] (x64)

TEST 2
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
CrystalDiskMark 5.2.1 Shizuku Edition x64 (C) 2007-2017 hiyohiyo
Crystal Dew World : http://crystalmark.info/
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
* MB/s = 1,000,000 bytes/s [SATA/600 = 600,000,000 bytes/s]
* KB = 1000 bytes, KiB = 1024 bytes

Sequential Read (Q= 32,T= 1) : 127.165 MB/s
Sequential Write (Q= 32,T= 1) : 128.629 MB/s
Random Read 4KiB (Q= 32,T= 1) : 0.603 MB/s [ 147.2 IOPS]
Random Write 4KiB (Q= 32,T= 1) : 1.503 MB/s [ 366.9 IOPS]
Sequential Read (T= 1) : 126.876 MB/s
Sequential Write (T= 1) : 130.874 MB/s
Random Read 4KiB (Q= 1,T= 1) : 0.574 MB/s [ 140.1 IOPS]
Random Write 4KiB (Q= 1,T= 1) : 1.516 MB/s [ 370.1 IOPS]

Test : 1024 MiB [G: 0.0% (0.2/1863.0 GiB)] (x5) [Interval=5 sec]
Date : 2017/05/28 11:07:14
OS : Windows 8.1 [6.3 Build 9600] (x64)


用HDTUNE check bad sector (quick scan)︰完全無bad sector
睇埋health個版，所有健康數值都係"好"


岩岩再放100+ GB 資料入去︰無聲

開返資料出來，randomly read下，例如睇下圖，開下files︰有少少click聲

感覺係random read/write有少少聲

使唔使worry？
